messages.content: What is the best way to cook salmon?

The best way to cook salmon is to grill it or smoke it. It is also good baked or roasted. If you are planning on smoking your salmon, use this basic recipe for a simple smoke flavor. 

1) Combine 1/4 cup of brown sugar, 1/4 cup of apple cider vinegar, 1 teaspoon of salt, and 1/2 teaspoon of pepper in a ziplock bag. Add the salmon and marinate in the bag for at least 30 minutes.

2) Prepare a hickory smoke with cherry wood and smoke the salmon until it reaches an internal temperature of 140 degrees.
Why is baking salmon not healthy?

Baking salmon does not provide the fish with any moisture, which could lead to a drying out of the fish. Baking salmon also alters the texture of the fish, making it harder to chew. Lastly, baking salmon with the intent to make it healthy is misleading to consumers, as it is not healthy to eat baked or fried salmon.

Baked or roasted salmon does provide the fish with some moisture, which helps retain the original texture of the fish. Additionally, baking salmon does not alter the texture of the fish, making it easier to chew. Lastly, baking salmon with the intent to make it healthy is not misleading to consumers, as it still implies that you are eating a meal that is high in fat and calories.
